020package org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal;
021
022import static java.util.Arrays.stream;
023import static java.util.Collections.unmodifiableList;
024import static java.util.stream.Collectors.toList;
025import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
026import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
027import static org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal.ClassNameImpl.OBJECT;
028import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.checkState;
029import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.isNull;
030import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
031
032import javax.lang.model.element.TypeParameterElement;
033import javax.lang.model.type.TypeVariable;
034import java.io.UncheckedIOException;
035import java.lang.reflect.Type;
036import java.util.ArrayList;
037import java.util.Collection;
038import java.util.HashMap;
039import java.util.List;
040import java.util.Map;
041
042import org.apiguardian.api.API;
043import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
044import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.ValidationException;
045import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.AnnotationSpec;
046import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.TypeName;
047import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.TypeVariableName;
048
049/**
050 *  The implementation of
051 *  {@link TypeNameImpl}
052 *  for type variable names.
053 *
054 *  @author Square,Inc.
055 *  @modified Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
056 *  @version $Id: TypeVariableNameImpl.java 1085 2024-01-05 16:23:28Z tquadrat $
057 *  @since 0.0.5
058 *
059 *  @UMLGraph.link
060 */
061@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: TypeVariableNameImpl.java 1085 2024-01-05 16:23:28Z tquadrat $" )
062@API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.0.5" )
063public final class TypeVariableNameImpl extends TypeNameImpl implements TypeVariableName
064{
065        /*------------*\
066    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
067        \*------------*/
068    /**
069     *  The bounds.
070     */
071    private final List<TypeNameImpl> m_Bounds;
072
073    /**
074     *  The name of this type variable.
075     */
076    private final String m_Name;
077
078        /*--------------*\
079    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
080        \*--------------*/
081    /**
082     *  Creates a new {@code TypeVariableNameImpl} instance.
083     *
084     *  @param  name    The name.
085     *  @param  bounds  The bounds.
086     */
087    public TypeVariableNameImpl( final String name, final List<TypeNameImpl> bounds )
088    {
089        this( name, bounds, new ArrayList<>() );
090    }   //  TypeVariableNameImpl()
091
092    /**
093     *  Creates a new {@code TypeVariableNameImpl} instance.
094     *
095     *  @param  name    The name.
096     *  @param  bounds  The bounds.
097     *  @param  annotations The annotations.
098     */
099    public TypeVariableNameImpl( final String name, final List<TypeNameImpl> bounds, final List<AnnotationSpecImpl> annotations )
100    {
101        super( annotations );
102        m_Name = requireNonNullArgument( name, "name" );
103        m_Bounds = requireNonNullArgument( bounds, "bounds" );
104
105        for( final var bound : m_Bounds )
106        {
107            checkState( !bound.isPrimitive() && bound != VOID_PRIMITIVE, () -> new ValidationException( "invalid bound: %s".formatted( bound ) ) );
108        }
109    }   //  TypeVariableNameImpl()
110
111        /*---------*\
112    ====** Methods **==========================================================
113        \*---------*/
114    /**
115     *  {@inheritDoc}
116     */
117    @Override
118    public final TypeVariableNameImpl annotated( final List<AnnotationSpec> annotations )
119    {
120        final var retValue = new TypeVariableNameImpl( m_Name, m_Bounds, requireNonNullArgument( annotations, "annotations" ).stream().map( a -> (AnnotationSpecImpl) a ).collect( toList() ) );
121
122        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
123        return retValue;
124    }   //  annotated()
125
126    /**
127     *  Return the bounds for this type variable name.
128     *
129     *  @return The bounds.
130     */
131    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
132    public final List<TypeNameImpl> bounds() { return List.copyOf( m_Bounds ); }
133
134    /**
135     *  {@inheritDoc}
136     */
137    @SuppressWarnings( {"PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface", "UseOfConcreteClass"} )
138    @Override
139    public final CodeWriter emit( final CodeWriter out ) throws UncheckedIOException
140    {
141        final var retValue = requireNonNullArgument( out, "out" );
142        emitAnnotations( retValue );
143        retValue.emitAndIndent( m_Name );
144
145        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
146        return retValue;
147    }   //  emit()
148
149    /**
150     *  Returns type variable equivalent to the given type.
151     *
152     *  @param  type    The type.
153     *  @return The type variable name.
154     */
155    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
156    public static final TypeVariableNameImpl from( final java.lang.reflect.TypeVariable<?> type )
157    {
158        final var retValue = from( type, Map.of() );
159
160        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
161        return retValue;
162    }   //  from()
163
164    /**
165     *  Returns type variable equivalent to the given type, after applying the
166     *  given type variables
167     *  .
168     *  @param  type    The type.
169     *  @param  typeVariables   The type variables.
170     *  @return The type variable name.
171     */
172    @SuppressWarnings( {"BoundedWildcard"} )
173    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
174    public static final TypeVariableNameImpl from( final java.lang.reflect.TypeVariable<?> type, final Map<Type,TypeVariableName> typeVariables )
175    {
176        var retValue = (TypeVariableNameImpl) requireNonNullArgument( typeVariables, "typeVariables" )
177            .get( requireNonNullArgument( type, "type" ) );
178        if( isNull( retValue) )
179        {
180            final List<TypeNameImpl> bounds = new ArrayList<>();
181            final var visibleBounds = unmodifiableList( bounds );
182            retValue = new TypeVariableNameImpl( type.getName(), visibleBounds );
183            final Map<Type,TypeVariableName> typeVariablesCopy = new HashMap<>( typeVariables );
184            typeVariablesCopy.put( type, retValue );
185            for( final var bound : type.getBounds() )
186            {
187                bounds.add( TypeNameImpl.from( bound, Map.copyOf( typeVariablesCopy ) ) );
188            }
189            bounds.remove( OBJECT );
190        }
191
192        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
193        return retValue;
194    }   //  from()
195
196    /**
197     *  Returns a new type variable named {@code name} without bounds.
198     *
199     *  @param  name    The name.
200     *  @return The type variable name.
201     */
202    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
203    public static final TypeVariableNameImpl from( final String name )
204    {
205        final var retValue = of( name, List.of() );
206
207        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
208        return retValue;
209    }   //  from()
210
211    /**
212     *  Returns a new type variable named {@code name} with {@code bounds}.
213     *
214     *  @param  name    The name.
215     *  @param  bounds  The bounds.
216     *  @return The type variable name.
217     */
218    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
219    public static final TypeVariableNameImpl from( final String name, final Type... bounds )
220    {
221        final var retValue = of( name, list( requireNonNullArgument( bounds, "bounds" ) ) );
222
223        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
224        return retValue;
225    }   //  from()
226
227    /**
228     *  Returns a new type variable named {@code name} with {@code bounds}.
229     *
230     *  @param  name    The name.
231     *  @param  bounds  The bounds.
232     *  @return The type variable name.
233     */
234    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
235    public static final TypeVariableNameImpl from( final String name, final TypeName... bounds )
236    {
237        final var retValue = of( name, stream( requireNonNullArgument( bounds, "bounds" ) )
238            .map( typeName -> (TypeNameImpl) typeName )
239            .toList() );
240
241        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
242        return retValue;
243    }   //  from()
244
245    /**
246     *  Returns a type variable name that is equivalent to the given element.
247     *
248     *  @param  element The element.
249     *  @return The new type variable name.
250     */
251    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
252    public static final TypeVariableNameImpl from( final TypeParameterElement element )
253    {
254        final var name = requireNonNullArgument( element, "element" ).getSimpleName().toString();
255        final var boundsMirrors = element.getBounds();
256
257        final var boundsTypeNames = boundsMirrors.stream()
258            .map( typeMirror -> TypeNameImpl.from( typeMirror, Map.of() ) )
259            .toList();
260        final var retValue = of( name, boundsTypeNames );
261
262        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
263        return retValue;
264    }   //  from()
265
266    /**
267     *  Returns a type variable name that is equivalent to the given mirror.
268     *
269     *  @param  mirror  The mirror.
270     *  @return The new type variable name.
271     */
272    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
273    public static TypeVariableNameImpl from( final TypeVariable mirror )
274    {
275        final var retValue = from( (TypeParameterElement) requireNonNullArgument( mirror, "mirror" ).asElement() );
276
277        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
278        return retValue;
279    }   //  from()
280
281    /**
282     *  Makes an instance of {@code TypeVariableName} for the given
283     *  {@link javax.lang.model.type.TypeMirror}.
284     *  This form is used internally to avoid infinite recursion in cases like
285     *  {@code Enum<E extends Enum<E>>}. When such a thing is encountered, a
286     *  {@code TypeVariableName} without bounds is made, and that is added to
287     *  the {@code typeVariables} map before looking up the bounds. Then if
288     *  encountered again while constructing the bounds, this
289     *  {@code TypeVariableName} can be just returned from the map. And, the
290     *  code that put the entry in {@code variables} will make sure that the
291     *  bounds are filled in before returning.
292     *
293     *  @param  mirror  The {@code TypeMirror}.
294     *  @param  typeVariables   The type variables.
295     *  @return The new type variable name.
296     */
297    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.2.0" )
298    public static final TypeVariableNameImpl from( final TypeVariable mirror, final Map<TypeParameterElement,TypeVariableNameImpl> typeVariables )
299    {
300        final var element = (TypeParameterElement) requireNonNullArgument( mirror, "mirror" ).asElement();
301        var retValue = requireNonNullArgument( typeVariables, "typeVariables" ).get( element );
302        if( isNull( retValue ) )
303        {
304            /*
305             * This code is a dirty hack: bounds will be modified after the
306             * return value was created with that list.
307             */
308            final List<TypeNameImpl> bounds = new ArrayList<>();
309            retValue = new TypeVariableNameImpl( element.getSimpleName().toString(), bounds );
310            typeVariables.put( element, retValue );
311            for( final var typeMirror : element.getBounds() )
312            {
313                bounds.add( TypeNameImpl.from( typeMirror, typeVariables ) );
314            }
315            bounds.remove( OBJECT );
316        }
317
318        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
319        return retValue;
320    }   //  from()
321
322    /**
323     *  Returns the name of this type variable.
324     *
325     *  @return The name.
326     */
327    @SuppressWarnings( "PublicMethodNotExposedInInterface" )
328    public final String name() { return m_Name; }
329
330    /**
331     *  Creates a new instance of {@code TypeVariableName} from the given name
332     *  and the given bounds.
333     *
334     *  @param  name    The name.
335     *  @param  bounds  The bounds.
336     *  @return The new instance.
337     */
338    private static final TypeVariableNameImpl of( final String name, final Collection<TypeNameImpl> bounds )
339    {
340        //---* Strip java.lang.Object from bounds if it is present *-----------
341        final var boundsNoObject = bounds.stream()
342            .filter( typeName -> !typeName.equals( OBJECT ) )
343            .toList();
344        final var retValue = new TypeVariableNameImpl( name, boundsNoObject );
345
346        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
347        return retValue;
348    }   //  of()
349
350    /**
351     *  {@inheritDoc}
352     */
353    @Override
354    public final TypeVariableNameImpl withBounds( final List<TypeName> bounds )
355    {
356        final var newBounds = new ArrayList<>( m_Bounds );
357        newBounds.addAll( requireNonNullArgument( bounds, "bounds" )
358            .stream()
359            .map( t -> (TypeNameImpl) t )
360            .toList()
361        );
362        final var retValue = new TypeVariableNameImpl( m_Name, List.copyOf( newBounds ), annotations() );
363
364        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
365        return retValue;
366    }   //  withBounds()
367
368    /**
369     *  Returns a new {@code TypeVariableName} instance as a copy of this one,
370     *  with the given bounds added.
371     *
372     *  @param  bounds  The additional bounds.
373     *  @return The new type variable name.
374     */
375    @Override
376    public final TypeVariableNameImpl withBounds( final Type... bounds )
377    {
378        final var newBounds = new ArrayList<>( m_Bounds );
379        newBounds.addAll( TypeNameImpl.list( requireNonNullArgument( bounds, "bounds" ) ) );
380        final var retValue = new TypeVariableNameImpl( m_Name, List.copyOf( newBounds ), annotations() );
381
382        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
383        return retValue;
384    }   //  withBounds()
385
386    /**
387     *  Returns a new {@code TypeVariableName} instance as a copy of this one,
388     *  with the given bounds added.
389     *
390     *  @param  bounds  The additional bounds.
391     *  @return The new type variable name.
392     */
393    @Override
394    public final TypeVariableNameImpl withBounds( final TypeName... bounds )
395    {
396        final var retValue = withBounds( List.of( bounds ) );
397
398        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
399        return retValue;
400    }   //  withBounds()
401
402    /**
403     *  {@inheritDoc}
404     */
405    @Override
406    public final TypeVariableNameImpl withoutAnnotations() { return new TypeVariableNameImpl( m_Name, m_Bounds ); }
407}
408//  class TypeVariableNameImpl
409

411 *  End of File
